com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface ISegmentedAssetFromParserObserver

  • public interface ISegmentedAssetFromParserObserver
    Interface for receiving notification when a ISegmentedAsset has been created from a parsed manifest
    See Also:
    ISegmentedAsset
    • Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      complete 
      abstract void complete(ISegmentedAsset aSegmentedAsset, int aError, boolean addedToQueue)
      One of the asynchronous methods for creating an ISegmentedAsset from a remote manifest has completed.
      void complete(ISegmentedAsset aSegmentedAsset, int aError, boolean addedToQueue)
      One of the asynchronous methods for creating an ISegmentedAsset from a remote manifest has completed.
      Parameters:
      aSegmentedAsset - Generated segmented asset, or null if creation failed.
      aError - Error that occurred; 0 means "no error." Other error codes defined in SegmentedParserError.
      addedToQueue - Boolean indicating whether the asset was added to Virtuoso's download queue.
      See Also:
      SegmentedParserError
      didParseSegment 
      abstract java.lang.String didParseSegment(ISegment segment)
      The SDK has parsed a segment for download.
      java.lang.String didParseSegment(ISegment segment)
      The SDK has parsed a segment for download. This method gives the enclosing application a chance to modify the download URL prior to it being queued for download. This allows you to append custom security tokens to the URL, or make any other manipulations that may be required prior to download. If you do not need to make any changes to the URL, you should return the unmodified URL from the segment's getRemotePath() method.
      Parameters:
      segment - The asset segment parsed from download.
      Returns:
      The modified URL to download for this segment.
      See Also:
      ISegment
      willAddToQueue 
      abstract void willAddToQueue(ISegmentedAsset aSegmentedAsset)
      The SDK has finished parsing the asset and is about to add the asset to the download queue.
      void willAddToQueue(ISegmentedAsset aSegmentedAsset)
      The SDK has finished parsing the asset and is about to add the asset to the download queue. This method gives the enclosing application a chance to modify the asset's configuration options (E.G. start window, end window, asset download limit) before the asset is added to the download queue and downloading begins.
      Parameters:
      aSegmentedAsset - Generated segmented asset.
